about_the_game:
Bring the action of Code of Princess into your RPG Maker projects with this free DLC!

Code of Princess combines the fast-paced battles of action games with stat-boosting and characterization from RPGs. Featuring a colorful cast of 4 characters, Code of Princess is the action-packed marvel you'll love playing. And now, you can add all 4 characters to your RPG Maker game.

This pack features:
  • Cast from Code of Princess
  • 4 walking character sprites in the same style as RPG Maker MV
  • Matching faceset for each character
  • Portrait/busts that can be used in menus and conversation

Code of Princess combines the fast-paced battles of action games with stat-boosting and characterization from RPGs. Featuring a colorful cast of 4 characters, Code of Princess is the action-packed marvel you'll love playing. And now, you can add all 4 characters to your RPG Maker game.

This pack features:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: RPG Maker MV - Code of Princess Graphic Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 desktop resolution or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

short_description: Bring the action of Code of Princess into your RPG Maker projects!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese
